name: Bug Off! (Philip Newsham)
description:
Made for Mini Jam 123: Web (There is no ground).

You are a fly stuck in a web! Click and drag the fly to aim, then let go to fling! Hitting a spider directly will knock you out, but if you can hit the back of the spider you can knock them off!

There is also no ground! So feel free to fling yourself offscreen, you won't be gone for long!

No real playtesting has been done on these levels, so you can use the left and right arrow keys to move between levels if you want to skip any.
